title: The cordiall of Mr. David Ienkins: or His reply to H.P. barrester of Lincolnes-Inne, answered.
author: Parker, Henry, 1604-1652.
publisher: Printed for Robert Bostock, dwelling in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Kings Head.,
notes: A reply, by Henry Parker, to: Jenkins, David. The cordiall of Judge Jenkins, for the good people of London.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
